name: Execute some hook before scenario outline

testSteps.description: Execute some hook before scenario outline #1: {number=1}

children.description: Given 1 scenarios with some before hook
When an exception happens during hook execution
Then the steps should have status Ignored
But the scenario should be reported as Failing

testSteps.description: Execute some hook before scenario outline #2: {number=2}

children.description: Given 2 scenarios with some before hook
When an exception happens during hook execution
Then the steps should have status Ignored
But the scenario should be reported as Failing

userStory.storyName: Exceptions in cucumber hooks must result in failed scenario execution

title: Execute some hook before scenario outline
